nl.inl.blacklab.search

Class ContentAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.ContentAccessor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentAccessorContentStore

    public abstract class ContentAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a way to access the original indexed content. NOTE: this class is very simple and has only 1 implementation. Maybe we should fold it into ContentStore or Searcher to simplify things.

      • getSubstringsFromDocument

        public abstract java.lang.String[] getSubstringsFromDocument(org.apache.lucene.document.Document d,
                                           int[] start,
                                           int[] end)
        Get substrings from a document. Note: if start and end are both -1 for a certain substring, the whole document is returned.
        Parameters:
        d - the Lucene document (contains the file name)
        start - start positions of the substrings
        end - end positions of the substrings
        Returns:
        the requested substrings from this document

      • getSubstringFromDocument

        public java.lang.String getSubstringFromDocument(org.apache.lucene.document.Document d,
                                        int start,
                                        int end)
        Get substrings from a document. Note: if start and end are both -1, the whole document is returned.
        Parameters:
        d - the Lucene document (contains the file name)
        start - start positions of the substrings
        end - end positions of the substrings
        Returns:
        the requested substrings from this document
